item.title: 300. æœ€é•¿é€’å¢å­åºåˆ—
item.description: class Solution { public int lengthOfLIS(int[] nums) { if (nums == null || nums.length == 0){return 0;} int[] dp = new int[nums.length]; Arrays.fill(dp,1); for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) { if(nums[i] > nums[j] && dp[j] + 1 > dp[i]){ dp[i] = dp[j] + 1; } } } return Arrays.stream(dp).max().getAsInt(); } } 300. æœ€é•¿é€’å¢å­åºåˆ—
